price: 2 Allah ! Il n’est de divinité digne d’être adorée que Lui, le Dieu Vivant et Eternel.
arabic: ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ٱلۡحَيُّ ٱلۡقَيُّومُ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: al-lahu lā ilāha illā huwa al-ḥayu al-qayūmu
translations: the Sustainer of all that exists
